posts.post_content:
Have this stack of raw cards I am not needing, so making them available.  Most are listed on eBay currently.

Please add $2 shipping for 1 or 2 cards. If buying 3 or more, shipping is on me. PayPal F&F only please. 

Will entertain offers, but anyone saying "I'll take it" gets precedence over ongoing negotiations.

Also willing to trade for EPDGs, if you have any.

$SOLD - Jordan SLer left
$SOLD - Jordan SLer right
$SOLD - Bill Hart SLer with a pinhole

$offer - Josh Clark with no name. May keep since its wider than normal.

$SOLD - Pattee
$SOLD - Willis Batting with Polar Bear back
$SOLD - Bescher Hands in air with EPDG back
$SOLD - Hulswitt EPDG back - one of the toughest cards with this back.
$SOLD - Nichols batting with Old Mill back
$SOLD - Anderson - nice card!
$SOLD - Pfeister seated - nice card!
$SOLD - Jennings portrait with EPDG back

[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab121/thromdog/Available/0B556C73-B01D-49DE-A211-851BD6109ED6.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab121/thromdog/Available/EB069418-9802-494B-8E4D-4D6692D3A5A9.jpg[/IMG]

Just got home from vacation, and Davy Jones was in the mail.

Thanks again.

Doug
